name: Memories: Back Home
description:
Play as a college student dropout moving back home. Explore your room and interact with your environment to find out more and more about the life you had lived and what brought you to the present day. Go back in time, explore different key parts of your life, and learn how to move forward with a new mindset. Your past has been defined but learn from your upbringing to forge a better, brighter future for yourself.

Controls:

  •  WASD for movement
  • E for interaction.
